SELECT PWB.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY /* PJ_MAIN_TB */ , PM.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM , PWB.PJ_WORK_SEQ AS PJ_WORK_SEQ /* 프로젝트 작업 순번 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_CLASS_CD AS PJ_WORK_CLASS_CD /* 프로젝트 작업 구분 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_DT AS PJ_WORK_DT /* 프로젝트 작업 일자 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_TAKE_TM AS PJ_WORK_TAKE_TM /* 시간(2)분(2) */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_NM AS PJ_WORK_NM /* 프로젝트 작업 명 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_CONT AS PJ_WORK_CONT /* 프로젝트 작업 내용 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_RESULT AS PJ_WORK_RESULT /* 프로젝트 작업 처리 결과 */ , PWB.REMARK AS REMARK /* 비고 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_TM AS PJ_WORK_TM /* 프로젝트 작업 시간 */ , CET.EMP_NM AS PJ_WORK_EMP_NM /* 작업자명 */ , PWB.REG_DT AS REG_DT , PWB.REG_TM AS REG_TM , PWB.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , PWB.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , PWB.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , PWB.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_WORK_TB PWB LEFT OUTER JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PM ON PWB.PJ_KEY = PM.PJ_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET ON CET.EMP_KEY = PWB.REG_EMP_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND PWB.PJ_KEY = #{pjKey}
AND PWB.PJ_WORK_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{performDtFrom}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{performDtTo}, '-', '') /* 기간 조건 검색 */
AND PWB.DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT PIB.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY /* PJ_MAIN_TB */ , PM.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM , PIB.INB_SEQ AS INB_SEQ , PIB.INB_PLACE AS INB_PLACE /* 설치구축 장소 */ , PIB.INB_CLASS AS INB_CLASS /* 설치구축 구분 */ , PIB.INB_PM_KEY AS INB_PM_KEY /* 설치구축 제품 관리키 */ , PPM.PM_NM_CD AS PM_NM /* 설치구축 제품명 */ , PIB.INB_PM_SERIAL_NO AS INB_PM_SERIAL_NO /* 설치구축 제품 시리얼 번호 */ , PIB.INB_DELIVERY_DT AS INB_DELIVERY_DT /* 설치구축 납품 일자 */ , PIB.INB_PM_VER AS INB_PM_VER /* 설치구축 제품 버전 */ , PIB.INB_SPEC_INFO AS INB_SPEC_INFO /* 설치구축 스펙 정보 */ , PIB.INB_CACHE_MEM AS INB_CACHE_MEM /* 설치구축 캐쉬 메모리 */ , PIB.INB_PORT_INFO AS INB_PORT_INFO /* 설치구축 포트 정보 */ , PIB.INB_MNG_IP AS INB_MNG_IP /* 설치구축 꽌리 아이피 */ , PIB.INB_PM_TYPE AS INB_PM_TYPE /* 설치구축 제품 유형 */ , PIB.REMARK AS REMARK /* 비고 */ , CET.EMP_NM AS INB_EMP_NM /* 설차구축 작업자명 */ , PIB.REG_DT AS REG_DT , PIB.REG_TM AS REG_TM , PIB.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , PIB.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , PIB.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , PIB.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_INSTALL_AND_BUILD_TB PIB LEFT OUTER JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PM ON PIB.PJ_KEY = PM.PJ_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PPM ON PPM.PM_KEY = PIB.INB_PM_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET ON CET.EMP_KEY = PIB.REG_EMP_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND PIB.PJ_KEY = #{pjKey}
AND PIB.INB_DELIVERY_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{performDtFrom}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{performDtTo}, '-', '') /* 기간 조건 검색 */
AND PIB.DELETE_YN = 'N'
